@paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump I bet sweet girl who broke up marriage, will get
in-house-care, as dear kimmie contracted covid19? No waiting in an emergency room for her, checking if there are enough ICU beds, like AZ having shortages of ICU beds, & having to send patients 100's miles away different hospital.
